#summary TOC for documentation about the documentation reader

= Introduction =

The documentation reader provides an easy way to organize technical reference documentation.  It allows the members of projects on code.google.com to organize their documentation as wiki pages and makes it easy for users to collect documentation from the set of projects they care about into a custom reference library.
